appInformation.app.description: The %{appName} permits secure issuance, validation and management of verifiable credentials with digital services. Placing privacy at the forefront, users are empowered with complete control over their data.
appInformation.app.title: About %{appName}
appInformation.company.description: As a leading Swiss provider of e-government solutions, Procivis AG supports government authorities in the provision of trusted online services for digital societies. Founded in 2016, Procivis works closely with its strategic partner and investor Orell FÃ¼ssli and benefits from its many years of experience in the field of security printing of physical identification documents. Further information can be found at www.procivis.ch.
appInformation.company.title: About Procivis AG
appInformation.title: Information
createBackup.dashboard.description: Securely backup your credentials and wallet with just a few taps. Your data is encrypted and protected by your chosen password.

createBackup.dashboard.title: Secure Your Data Effortlessly.

createBackup.recoveryPassword.descriptio:
Your recovery password will enable you to encrypt and decrypt your backups and enable you to securely recover your personal data.

All your backups will use the same password.
createBackup.recoveryPassword.title: Add recovery password

restoreBackup.dashboard.description:
Welcome to the restoration guide for your digital wallet! If you need to  revert your wallet to a previous state, this guide will walk you  through the process of restoring it from a backup.

Please follow these  steps carefully to ensure a successful restoration. Remember, restoring  from a backup might replace your current data, potentially leading to  the loss of any credentials or changes made after the backup was  created.
Proceed with caution.
restoreBackup.dashboard.title: Restore Wallet Backup
restoreBackup.import.description: Please select your backup file to continue.
restoreBackup.import.title: Restore Wallet Backup
restoreBackup.preview.consent: I understand, by recovering to this backup, all current data and credentials will be lost and cannot be retrieved.
restoreBackup.preview.cta.subtitle: Hold for %{seconds} seconds
restoreBackup.preview.description: The backup contains the following credentials:
restoreBackup.preview.title: Restore Wallet Backup
restoreBackup.processing.title: Restore Wallet Backup
restoreBackup.recoveryPassword.descripti: Please enter the backup password to decrypt your backup and 'restore' your wallet.
restoreBackup.recoveryPassword.title: Enter Backup Password
restoreBackup.unlock.title: Restore Wallet Backup
